name: One Piece: Grand Battle! 3
description:
One Piece: Grand Battle! 3 is a 3D versus fighting game based on the One Piece anime and manga series and is the sequel to One Piece: Grand Battle! 2. The game offers a total of sixteen playable character from the series up the Sky Island Arc.

Each fighter can run and jump and have their own fighting techniques including special attacks. In the various fighting arenas barrels and chests can be found that contain items that can be used to the players advantage (restoring health or extra speed or attack power among others).

The sixteen playable characters are: Monkey D. Luffy, Roronoa Zoro, Nami, Usopp, Sanji, Chopper, Nico Robin, Smoker, Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, Crocodile, Wiper, Ohm, Enel, Hina, Portgas D. Ace and Shanks. The four game modes offered are Grand Battle, Event Battle, Grand Tours and a Training mode.
